meanings.definition: A type of citrus fruit that is a hybrid of a tangerine and a grapefruit.
meanings.sent1: I love the sweet taste of minneolas.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on minneolas.
meanings.sent3: The minneolas rolled off the table and onto the floor, creating a fruity mess.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as refreshing as biting into a juicy minneola.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant color of the minneolas brightened up the kitchen.

meanings.definition: Plural form of minneola, referring to multiple instances of the citrus fruit.
meanings.sent1: We bought a bag of minneolas for the party.
meanings.sent2: The minneolas in the bowl looked ripe and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a minneola-eating contest at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the minneolas filled the room like a citrusy perfume.
meanings.sent5: The minneolas added a burst of flavor to the salad.
